      • WeaponCard

        public WeaponCard(java.lang.String name,
                  java.lang.String descr,
                  java.lang.String img,
                  AmmoCube paidCost,
                  AmmoCube[] extraCost)
           throws InvalidNameException
        constructor for json parser
        Parameters:
        name - of the weapon
        descr - description of the weapon
        img - path to the weapon's image
        paidCost - in addition to extraCost define the reload cost
        extraCost - paid when grabbing the weapon
        Throws:
        InvalidNameException
